quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Planet and Bats
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, primate, bird. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Vampire bats have poor eyesight.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Vampire bats can be quite tame, and even friendly to humans.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What Gorilla is the largest primate on the planet?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eastern Lowland Gorilla

questions.question: What is the average lifespan of a vampire bat?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 40-50 years

questions.question: What is the largest fish in existence?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Whale shark

questions.question: Do vampire bats ever roost alone?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Vampire bats blood-sucking does not hurt the bitten animal.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Out of 200 vampire bats, approximately how many have rabies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1

questions.question: Approximately how much does a typical female vampire bat weigh?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1.5 oz.

questions.question: Where are vampire bats mostly found?

options.text: Mexico, Central America and South America

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mexico, Central America and South America

questions.question: Name the largest mollusk and the largest invertebrate in the world?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Colossal squid

questions.question: How do wolves mark their territory?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: A vampire bat will die if it doesnt find blood for how many nights in a row?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2

questions.question: What is the largest living terrestrial organism on the planet?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: African Bush Elephant

questions.question: What is the largest living bird of prey on the planet?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eurasian Black Vulture

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Wolf and Animal
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, actor, kind. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the largest wolf species on the planet as well as the largest wild representative of the Canidae family?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Grey wolf

questions.question: What kind of animal is the Spotted wobbegong?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fish

questions.question: Wolves do not wag their tails as dogs do when they are happy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What type of wolf is White Fang from Jack Londons popular novel White Fang?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wolf hybrid

questions.question: Which of these statements about the Australian fauna is true?

options.text: Australia is the only continent that has more venomous than non-venomous snake species
Two of the five known species of monotremes live in Australia
Placental mammals are relatively rare in Australia

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What animal is the largest macropod and one of Australias heraldic animals?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Red kangaroo

questions.question: What is the common name of the Quoll, a carnivorous marsupial native to Australia and Papua New Guinea?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Native cat

questions.question: What actor directed and starred in the popular 1990 movie Dances with Wolves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kevin Costner

questions.question: Wolf pups are usually born with irises of this color, which changes with time.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Blue

questions.question: Which of these areas is the Black Salamander endemic to?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: United States

questions.question: In what European city is the popular bronze statue Capitoline Wolf located?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rome

questions.question: What animals do wolves generally prefer to feed on?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ungulates

questions.question: To what continent is the unique Maned Wolf endemic?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: South America

questions.question: Which animals have the most unique species endemic to Australia?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Amphibians

questions.question: What animal is considered the major enemy of the wolf in the wild, apart from humans?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Other wolves

quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Statements and Animal
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, widow, blackworm. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of these statements is true about the Black garden ant?

options.text: Each colony has only one queen.
It is found in North America and Asia.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: This animal is considered a marine mammal because it lives on the sea ice most of the year.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Polar bear

questions.question: This animal is the heaviest member of its family, and also one of the smallest marine mammals.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sea otter

questions.question: Which of these statements is true about the Western black widow spider?

options.text: The female always eats the male after mating.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It is extremely venomous.

questions.question: The Hooded Seal is a marine mammal that populates this geographic area.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Central and western North Atlantic

questions.question: The name Lumbriculus variegatus, or blackworm, refers to a few worm species. In what way do they reproduce?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: By regeneration

questions.question: Which of these statements is true about the Black Iberian Pig?

options.text: It is indigenous to the Mediterranean.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It is indigenous to the Mediterranean.

questions.question: Which of these names refers to the Asian black bear, a close relative of the American black bear?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What type of food does the Lesser Vasa Parrot, also known as Black Parrot, feed on?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fruit

questions.question: What animal is is the only strictly-marine herbivorous mammal in the world?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: The Black wolf is actually a color variant of which wolf species?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Grey wolf

questions.question: The Humpback Whale, one of the largest marine mammals, feeds in this season.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Summer

questions.question: Which of these marine mammals matches the description: Very large body, has tusks and whiskers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Walrus

questions.question: How did the Black Mamba snake get its name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Because its mouth is black

questions.question: Which of these statements is true about the Black dog, a ghost-like creature popular in the folklores of the British Isles?

options.text: It is believed to appear at night.
It is associated with the Devil.
It is considered a portent of death.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

quizzes.title: Nature Quiz: Chinchillas and Chinchilla
quizzes.description: Test your nature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Nature, chinchillas, mean. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which is the wrong statement about chinchilla breeding?

options.text: Chinchilla litters predominately consist of twins.
Chinchillas can breed any time of the year.
Little chinchillas are born furred and with eyes open.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chinchillas have a 45-day gestation period.

questions.question: Chinchillas are great pets for children - they are animals of very friendly nature and love to be held.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: The natural habitat of the Chinchilla is this region in South America.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Andes

questions.question: To which chinchilla species do most of the domestic chinchillas belong?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chinchilla lanigera

questions.question: Chinchillas should be bathed with warm water at least once a week.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: This extraordinary marine mammal is often considered a whale, but it is actually a dolphin.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Dolphins are considered some of the most intelligent animals on the planet. How are they classified according to their diet?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They are carnivores.

questions.question: This marine mammal is known as the pilot whale, but it is not actually a whale. What type of animal is it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dolphin

questions.question: Translated in English, what does the name of the chinchilla mean?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Little Chincha

questions.question: In nature, chinchillas can be found in only one color. Which one is it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Grey

questions.question: Which of the following should be avoided in the pet chinchillas diet?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fresh vegetables

questions.question: Chinchillas have a wide range of hearing - 5 Hz to 60 kHz
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which of these physiological features does the chinchilla lack?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The ability to sweat

questions.question: Which of these animals are among the many marine mammals that use songs for the purposes of communication?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Name the two types of Chinese Crested dogs.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hairless and Powderpuff

quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Dog and Chinese Crested Dog
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, ears, origin. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The Chinese Crested dog does not require much exercise.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The Chinese Crested dog is very timid.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What term is commonly used to denote a group of foxes?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Which of the following behaviors is not typical for the Chinese Crested dog?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pant to keep cool

questions.question: A Chinese Crested dogs ears are not cropped.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What fox species is considered to be the smallest on the planet?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fennec Fox

questions.question: How are most foxes generally classified according to their diet?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Omnivores

questions.question: A hairless Chinese Crested dog needs to be protected from which of the following?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Which of these names refers to the Crab-eating Fox, a medium-sized fox found in the central part of South America?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Which breed group does the Chinese Crested dog belong to?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Toy

questions.question: What notable feature does the Fennec Fox possess, that makes it easily recognizable?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Very large ears

questions.question: The two types of Chinese Crested dogs are born in separate litters, they cannot come from the same litter.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: The origin of the Chinese Crested dog is unknown, but according to some sources it may have come from which of these places?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mexico and Africa

questions.question: What is the meaning the word which stands for fox in many languages?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tail

questions.question: Chinese Crested dogs are very suspicious of strangers and can make very good watchdogs.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: World and Fox
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, kind, books. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of these names belongs to the fox species that is the second smallest fox species in the world, slightly smaller than a domestic cat?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What would some species of  porcupine consume in order to supply calcium ans salts?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bones

questions.question: To which of these geographical areas are hummingbirds indigenous?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: North and South America

questions.question: Which of these statements is true about rodent species in general?

options.text: The Latin word rodere, from which rodent originates, means rat.
Rodents have canine teeth only on their lower jaw.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rodents do not vomit.

questions.question: The Capybara is the largest rodent in the world. What is the meaning of its name, derived from a word of the Guaraní language?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Master of the grasses

questions.question: What eminent musician released his album The Fox in 1981?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elton John

questions.question: which of these stories and books have a fox character involved in the storyline?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Adventures of Pinocchio

questions.question: Chipmunks are small squirrel-like rodents belonging to the genus Tamias. What does the Greek word tamias mean?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Storer

questions.question: What kind of unique activity is characteristic of the African Pygmy Mouse, the smallest rodent in the world?

options.text: It disguises its young using leaves.
It starts dancing when it feels threatened by a predator.
It piles up pebbles in front of its burrow.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It piles up pebbles in front of its burrow.

questions.question: According to Chinese mythology, what shape do fox spirits known as huli jing take in the real world?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Women

questions.question: What defense tactic does the chinchilla use in order to escape from its predators, which include birds of prey, skunks, felines, snakes and canines?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Spraying urine

questions.question: Guinea pigs are very intelligent, highly social animals that use special vocalization to communicate. What does their whistling or wheeking sound express?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Excitement

questions.question: Groundhogs are mostly herbivorous rodents that sometimes eat animal matter. What kind of animals would they feed on?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: The acouchis, small diurnal rodents found along riverbanks in the Amazon Rainforest, usually feed on this type of food.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fruit

questions.question: What rodent, closely related to the chinchilla and guinea pig, is also known as the Brush-Tailed Rat and is native to Chile?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Degu
